articles.title: Stock Market Live: Sensex, Nifty listless; Asian Paints up 3%, SBI top drag - Business Standard
articles.description: Stock Market LIVE, November 17, 2023: Among sectors, financials were the weakest with Nifty PSU Bank index slipping 2.44 per cent. Nifty Bank shed 0.8 per cent
articles.content: The broader markets were also tepid. The BSE MidCap index dipped 0.2 per cent and SmallCap pocket was flat. Among sectors, financials were the weakest with Nifty PSU Bank index slipping 2.44 per cent… [+30 chars]

articles.title: "This Is The Time To...": PM Modi Condemns Civilian Deaths In Gaza War - NDTV
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today condemned the deaths of civilians in the ongoing Israel-Hamas war and highlighted the urgent need for unity and cooperation among the Global South in the face of escalating challenges rising in West Asia.
articles.content:
The Prime Minister underscored the importance of exercising restraint and prioritising dialogue

articles.title: Alibaba shares plunge after reversing spinoff plan of cloud unit - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Jack Ma's family trusts to sell down stakes in e-commerce group for nearly $871m
articles.content: HONG KONG -- Alibaba Group Holding has reversed a plan to fully spin off its cloud unit, the company said Thursday, in a surprise move that the Chinese group attributed to tougher U.S. controls on ch… [+316 chars]
